desc: Rich Oil is the must-have skin soother for everything that irritates your outsides! For Burns & Hot Messes, Bug Bites & Itchy Bits, Little Cuts & Scrapes. It’s the wonder remedy you’ll want to keep handy for man, woman, and child. Must-have in your kitchen, bathroom, diaper bag, car, and camper.

layout.text:
The rich, all-natural alternative
to chemical ointments and sun screen
